channel.title: control version system on Catatan Sasongko
channel.description: Recent content in control version system on Catatan Sasongko

item.title: Install Bazaar
item.description: Bazaar atau disingkat bzr adalah salah 1 jenis control version system seperti git. Git secara default sudah terinstall tapi bzr harus diinstal sendiri. $ wget http://launchpad.net/bzr/2.6/2.6.0/+download/bzr-2.6.0.tar.gz $ tar xzf bzr-2.6.0.tar.gz $ cd bzr-2.6.0 # python setup.py install
